anya-e0105n20:1_0: Bahū pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā dhammānandādayo ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghosatthero dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko’’ti vadanti. Ayaṁ panettha yutti,
anya-e0105n20:1_2: Tathā hi buddhavaṁsaṭṭhakathāya ca abhidhammāvatāraṭṭhakathāya ca vinayavinicchayaṭṭhakathāya ca kārako ācariyabuddhadattatthero coḷaraṭṭhe tambapaṇṇinadiyaṁ uraganagare jāto ācariyabuddhaghosena ekakāliko ca.
anya-e0105n20:1_5: Khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaudānādipāḷiyā saṁvaṇṇanābhūtāya paramatthadīpaniyā kārako ācariyadhammapālattheropi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe kañcipurajātiko. Tathevāyampīti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n20:4_0: Ettha ca kañcipuraṁ nāma madarasanagarassa īsakaṁ pacchimanissite dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcacattālīsamilappamāṇe padese idāni kañjīvara iti voharitanagarameva.
anya-e0105n20:8_0: Ettha ca mayūradūtapaṭṭanaṁ nāma idāni madarasanagarasamīpe milapora iti voharitaṭṭhānanti porāṇappavattigavesīhi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n20:9_0: Imāhi pana nigamanagāthāhi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭheyeva nivutthapubbataṁ pakāseti, bodhimaṇḍasamīpe vā,
anya-e0105n20:9_1: marammaraṭṭhe vā nivutthapubbatāya pakāsanañca na dissati.
anya-e0105n20:9_2: Tena ācariyabuddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko na hotīti na sakkā paṭikkhipituṁ.
anya-e0105n20:11_0: ‘‘Yaṁ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṁ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṁ sandhāya kathita’nti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n20:11_1: taṁ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā gabbhapāḷiyo sandhāya vutta’’nti.
anya-e0105n20:12_0: Iminā pana vacanena ‘‘andhakaṭṭhakathā andhakaraṭṭhikehi therehi katā’’ti pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0105n20:12_1: ācariyabuddhaghosopi ca andhakaṭṭhakathāya sandhāyabhāsitampi tandesikagabbhapāḷisannivesākārampi suṭṭhu jānāti,
anya-e0105n20:12_2: tasmā tandesiko na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0105n20:13_1: Ettha ca kheṭoti padassa gāmoti vā,
anya-e0105n20:13_3: khuddakanagaranti vā tayo atthā sakkatābhidhāne pakāsitā,
anya-e0105n20:13_4: dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhesu ca yāvajjatanāpi gāmo kheḍāti voharīyati.
anya-e0105n20:13_7: tena moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenāti vacanatthaṁ katvā ‘‘moraṇḍagāme jātoti vattabbena therenā’’ti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0105n20:13_8: Idāni pana dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍato ekapaṇṇāsamilamatte (51) amaravatito ca aṭṭhapaṇṇāsamilamatte (58) padese kotanemalipurīti ca gundalapallīti ca voharitaṁ ṭhānadvayamatthi,
anya-e0105n20:13_10: nemalīti telaguvohāro ca morassa, gundalu iti ca aṇḍassa,
anya-e0105n20:13_11: tasmā taṁ ṭhānadvayameva pubbe moraṇḍakheṭoti voharito ācariyabuddhaghosassa jātigāmo bhaveyyāti porāṇaṭṭhānagavesīhi gahito.
anya-e0105n20:13_12: Yasmā panetaṁ ‘‘moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā’’ti padaṁ ‘‘moraṇḍagāmajātenā’’ti padaṁ viya pāḷinayānucchavikaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0105n20:13_13: aññehi ca bahūhi visesanapadehi ekato aṭṭhatvā visesyapadassa pacchato visuṁ ṭhitaṁ,
anya-e0105n20:13_15: tasmā etaṁ kenaci taṁkālikena ācariyassa jātiṭṭhānaṁ sañjānantena pakkhittaṁ viya dissatīti.
anya-e0105n20:14_0: Imesu pana tīsu ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jātoti ca marammaraṭṭhikoti ca dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko’’ti ca vuttavacanesu pacchimameva balavataraṁ hoti ācariyasseva vacananissitattā,
anya-e0105n20:14_1: tasmā tadeva nissāya ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti evaṁ veditabbā.
